name: Convert PDF to Scanned PDF Locally Without Uploading to Server
description: Convert PDF with selectable text, images or pasted signatures to a non-selectable scanned document instantly without uploading your files to a server.

shortcuts.name: PDF to Scanned PDF
shortcuts.description: Convert any PDF with selectable text, images or pasted signatures to a non-selectable scanned document without uploading your files to a server. All processing to make PDF look scanned happens instantly and locally in your browser.

shortcuts.name: Compress PDF
shortcuts.description: Securely reduce the size of your PDF files.
